channel.title: Change admin icon
channel.description: on my server, when the admins talk it just shows a gold crown with an m, and it also shows that for an owner, i want to change it to the blue crown with the A, the icon is in my sprites folder in my client folder but idk how to change the icons because i can't find the icon with the gold crown and the m in the folder. Can someone help me? And if you were wondering, I have used the search bar![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 06:38:47 pm[/size][hr]I'm using a delta source too, and I'm pretty sure my client is a 377

item.title: Change admin icon
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Well is there some way I can change it with the Bl00d Pkz client? It’s based off of Bluurr’s client

Read full topic

item.title: Change admin icon
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

r0ckstar96:

on my server, when the admins talk it just shows a gold crown with an m, and it also shows that for an owner, i want to change it to the blue crown with the A, the icon is in my sprites folder in my client folder but idk how to change the icons because i can’t find the icon with the gold crown and the m in the folder. Can someone help me? And if you were wondering, I have used the search bar![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 06:38:47 pm[/size][hr]I’m using a delta source too, and I’m pretty sure my client is a 377

Use tom’s cache suite, and change the one in the cache. That is the crown it is operating from. Also, to change the stuff in your sprites folder use MSPaint.

Read full topic
